text: “chen deiyw kab sphaph hæng wngswan fi rxa wn læa brrda phu kxn hna phwk khea sung phwk khea ptiseth brrda xongkar hæng phracea khxng phwk khea læw rea kdi thalay phwk khea neuxngdwy khwam phid khxng phwk khea læa rea di hı wngswan fi rxa wn cm natay læa thanghmd nan phwk khea pen phu xthrrm”
